mapper.update: merge into cmt_tb using dual on ( trunc(sysdate, 'dd') = trunc(cmt_str_tm, 'dd') and stf_sq = #{stf_sq} ) when not matched then insert (cmt_sq, stf_sq, cmt_str_tm, cmt_msg) values (cmt_tb_cmt_sq.nextval, #{stf_sq}, sysdate, #{cmt_msg})
mapper.select:
select b.scd_nm, a.cmt_sq, a.stf_sq, a.cmt_str_tm, a.cmt_end_tm, a.cmt_msg, a.days, b.scd_cnt, b.ldt, to_char(trunc(b.ldt, 'dd'), 'mm.dd') || '(' ||to_char(b.ldt, 'dy')|| ')' cmt_dt from ( select cmt_sq, stf_sq, cmt_str_tm, cmt_end_tm, cmt_msg, trunc(cmt.cmt_str_tm, 'dd') days from cmt_tb cmt where stf_sq = #{stf_sq} ) a, ( select * from (
select trunc(to_date(#{startDate}), 'dd')+level-1 ldt
select trunc(sysdate, 'MM')+level-1 ldt
from dual
connect by level <= to_date(#{endDate})-trunc(to_date(#{startDate}), 'dd')+1
connect by level <= last_day(sysdate)-trunc(sysdate, 'MM')+1
)l, (
select bs.*, div.scd_nm, case when bs.strdt != bs.enddt then case when bs.searchstr = bs.searchend then null when bs.searchstr != bs.searchend then case when bs.searchstr >= bs.strdt then case when bs.searchend <= bs.enddt then case when bs.searchend >= bs.enddt then bs.searchend - bs.searchstr when bs.searchend < bs.enddt then bs.enddt - bs.searchstr end
end when bs.searchstr < bs.strdt then case when bs.searchend <= bs.enddt then case when bs.searchend >= bs.enddt then bs.searchend - bs.strdt when bs.searchend < bs.enddt then bs.enddt - bs.searchstr end when bs.searchend > bs.enddt then bs.enddt - bs.strdt end end end
end as scd_cnt
select bs.*, div.scd_nm, bs.enddt - bs.strdt scd_cnt
from ( select stf_sq, scd_sq, trunc(bs_scd_str_dt, 'dd') strdt, trunc(bs_scd_end_dt, 'dd') enddt, to_date('${startDate}') searchstr, to_date('${endDate}') searchend from bs_scd_tb where stf_sq = #{stf_sq} )bs, scd_div_tb div
where bs.enddt >= bs.searchstr and bs.strdt <= bs.searchend and bs.scd_sq = div.scd_sq
where bs.scd_sq = div.scd_sq
and bs.scd_sq in (3, 5, 6) )r where l.ldt = r.strdt(+) ) b where a.days(+) = b.ldt order by b.ldt

select c.cmt_str_tm, c.cmt_end_tm, c.cmt_msg, sub.stf_sq, sub.stf_nm, sub.rnk_nm, sub.rnk_sq, sub.dpt_nm, sub.scd_sq, sub.scd_nm from ( select * from cmt_tb
where trunc(cmt_tb.cmt_str_tm, 'dd') = trunc(to_date('${searchDate}', 'yy/mm/dd'), 'dd')
where trunc(cmt_tb.cmt_str_tm, 'dd') = trunc(sysdate, 'dd')
)c, ( select stf.stf_sq, stf.stf_nm, stf.rnk_sq, stf.rnk_nm, stf.dpt_nm, scd.scd_sq, scd.bs_scd_str_dt, scd.bs_scd_end_dt, scd.scd_nm from ( select s.stf_sq, s.stf_nm, s.dpt_sq, rnk.rnk_sq, rnk.rnk_nm, d.dpt_nm from stf_tb s, dpt_div_tb d, rnk_tb rnk where s.dpt_sq = d.dpt_sq and s.dpt_sq = ${dpt_sq} and s.rnk_sq = rnk.rnk_sq )stf, ( select bs.scd_sq, bs.stf_sq, bs.bs_scd_str_dt, bs.bs_scd_end_dt, div.scd_nm from bs_scd_tb bs, scd_div_tb div where bs.scd_sq = div.scd_sq
and to_char(to_date('${searchDate}'), 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(bs.bs_scd_str_dt, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(bs.bs_scd_end_dt, 'yy/mm/dd')
and to_char(to_date(sysdate), 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(bs.bs_scd_str_dt, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(bs.bs_scd_end_dt, 'yy/mm/dd')
and bs.scd_sq in (3, 5, 6) )scd where stf.stf_sq = scd.stf_sq(+) )sub where c.stf_sq(+) = sub.stf_sq order by rnk_sq desc
